sarkas.potentials.moliere module¶

Module for handling Moliere Potential

sarkas.potentials.moliere.Moliere_force_PP(r, pot_matrix)[source]¶

Calculates the PP force between particles using the Moliere Potential.

Parameters

  • r (float) – Particles’ distance.

  • pot_matrix (numpy.ndarray) – Moliere potential parameters.

Returns

  • phi (float) – Potential

  • fr (float) – Force

sarkas.potentials.moliere.update_params(potential, params)[source]¶

Assign potential dependent simulation’s parameters.

Parameters

  • potential (sarkas.potentials.base.Potential) – Class handling potential form.

  • params (sarkas.base.Parameters) – Simulation’s parameters.
